mapper.insert: insert into review(useremail, moviecode, reviewcontent, reviewstar) values(#{useremail}, #{moviecode}, #{reviewcontent}, #{reviewstar})
mapper.update: update review set reviewstar=#{reviewstar}, reviewcontent=#{reviewcontent} where moviecode=#{moviecode} and useremail=#{useremail}
mapper.delete: delete from review where moviecode=#{moviecode} and useremail=#{useremail}
mapper.select: select count(*) from review where moviecode=#{moviecode}
select avg(reviewstar) from review where moviecode=#{moviecode}
select * from review where moviecode=#{moviecode} and useremail=#{useremail}
